title: Imagine
lyrics_snippet: Imagine all the people living life in peace

title: Let It Be
lyrics_snippet: When I find myself in times of trouble Mother Mary comes to me

title: Bohemian Rhapsody
lyrics_snippet: Is this the real life? Is this just fantasy?

title: Hallelujah
lyrics_snippet: I heard there was a secret chord that David played and it pleased the Lord

title: Hey Jude
lyrics_snippet: Hey Jude, don't make it bad take a sad song and make it better

title: Someone Like You
lyrics_snippet: Never mind, I'll find someone like you

title: Shake It Off
lyrics_snippet: Cause the players gonna play, play, play, play, play

title: Uptown Funk
lyrics_snippet: Don’t believe me just watch

title: Bad Guy
lyrics_snippet: So you're a tough guy, like it really rough guy

title: Blinding Lights
lyrics_snippet: I said, ooh, I'm blinded by the lights

title: Rolling in the Deep
lyrics_snippet: We could have had it all rolling in the deep

title: Thinking Out Loud
lyrics_snippet: I'm thinking out loud maybe we found love right where we are

title: Stay With Me
lyrics_snippet: Won't you stay with me? 'Cause you're all I need

title: Royals
lyrics_snippet: And we'll never be royals, it don't run in our blood

title: Happy
lyrics_snippet: Clap along if you feel like happiness is the truth

title: Can't Feel My Face
lyrics_snippet: I can't feel my face when I'm with you

title: All of Me
lyrics_snippet: Cause all of me loves all of you

title: Radioactive
lyrics_snippet: Welcome to the new age, to the new age, I'm radioactive

title: Take Me to Church
lyrics_snippet: Take me to church, I'll worship like a dog at the shrine of your lies

title: Shallow
lyrics_snippet: I'm off the deep end, watch as I dive in
